00047 void ReadCsv::Read(std::istream & input, std::vector< std::vector<std::string> > & output)
00048 {
00049         std::string csvLine;
00050 
00051         // read every line from the stream
00052         while( std::getline(input, csvLine) )
00053         {
00054                 std::istringstream csvStream(csvLine);
00055                 std::vector<std::string> csvColumn;
00056                 std::string csvElement;
00057 
00058                 // read every element from the line that is seperated by commas
00059                 // and put it into the vector of strings
00060                 while( std::getline(csvStream, csvElement, ',') )
00061                 {
00062                         csvColumn.push_back(csvElement);
00063                 }
00064                 output.push_back(csvColumn);
00065         }
00066 }
